data.title: Lash Extensions - BUY 5 GET 1 FREE
data.meta_description: Level up your lashing with BELO Lash's range of premium eyelash extensions, from our bestselling Velvet collection, Classic lashes, Easy fans and more!
data.text:
Specifically designed by lash technicians for lash technicians, our eyelash range covers all of your bases, allowing you to boss every lashing technique. Whether your client is looking for mega volume or natural lashes, BELO Lash extensions can help you put together the perfect eyelash look for your clients. Once you've picked the right eyelash extensions, pick a lash adhesive to ensure a secure and long-lasting hold for your clients’ gorgeous new eyelash extensions.

Classic lashes

Our classic cashmere lashes are perfect for 1:1 application to help create a timeless look that enhances your clients’ natural beauty. Classic lashes offer an extension to your clients’ natural lashes, which then accentuates the natural eye shape.

BELO classic eyelash extensions offer better eyelash retention for your treatments compared to faux mink classics as our flat base design adheres to the natural lash seamlessly. The flat synthetic fibres of our cashmere classic lashes are a lightweight alternative to other classic eyelash extensions.

Classic Cashmere Lashes are our twist on mink lashes – our super wispy matte black flat eyelash extensions! Cashmere classics can be applied with volume lashes or in 1:1 application for a timeless look.

CLASSIC cashmere lashes are stocked in 0.20 & 0.15 D curl and CC curl.

Our classic lash mixed trays run from 8 -15mm.

Individual length trays available from 8mm -16mm.

Russian Volume lashes

Our Russian Volume lashes are the eyelash extensions that mean business when it comes to volume and length. Whether your client chooses a soft matte lash style, a unique brown-toned option, or selects from our extensive variety tray, you can be sure to provide top quality extensions using BELO LASH Russian Volumes for your treatments.

Russian Volume lash techniques involve applying more than one synthetic lash to each of the client's natural lashes. Volume sets can offer technicians more room to hone application techniques, create unique eyelash looks and blend different styles.

Our range of Russian Volume extensions are a technician's best friend as you can offer your clients completely customisable sets.

Velvet Russian Lashes – our bestselling super soft matte volume lashes. The go-to lash for versatile lash extensions which suit your clients’ needs.

VELVET volume lashes are stocked in 0.5d & 0.3d, C, D & DD curl.

Mixed eyelash trays available in 8-15mm, 12-18mm and 16-20mm

Individual lash length trays available from 9mm-18mm.

Brown Velvet Russian Lashes – just like our bestsellers, these lashes offer a unique, soft matte finish, ideal for clients seeking a natural yet elegant look, but in brown. The brown colour offers a subtle depth, making them perfect for those who prefer a softer alternative to the traditional black lashes.

Brown Velvet Russian Lashes are stocked in 0.03d & 0.05d, C & D curl.

Mixed trays available in 8mm-15mm.

Easy Fan extensions

Easy fan eyelash extensions are your secret weapon when it comes to creating volume lash sets, saving you time on application and making your life as a technician so much easier! Simply pinch the base of the eyelash extensions together to create custom fans without the need for glue.

Velvet Easy Fan Lashes – our easy fan lashes are heat bonded at the base to create instant volume fans without relying solely on glue! A great alternative to pre-made fan lashes to create fluffier custom sets.

EASY FAN volume lashes are available in C & D curl, 0.03 & 0.05 thickness.

Mixed eyelash trays of 8mm-15mm and 12mm-18mm.

10-16mm individual eyelash lengths.

PROmade fans

BELO Pretty in Promade fans are your secret weapon for creating volume and hybrid looks quickly, without the fuss. Hand made with SNATCHED bases, our promade fans will revolutionise your lashing technique.

Pre-made extensions

Pre-Made Angel Lashes – Elevate your clients' lash experience with these ready-to-apply lashes, perfect for crafting a diverse array of styles from natural to dramatic. Each meticulously crafted fan offers a blend of finesse and volume, ensuring your clients' lashes stand out.

As you continue to refine your application techniques and create stunning looks for your clients with this variety of eyelash extensions, remember that the right tools can elevate your craft to new heights!

How long do lash extensions typically last?

Eyelash extensions can last anywhere from 4 to 6 weeks, depending on the client's natural lash growth cycle and how well they maintain them. The importance of lash pre-treatment and post-treatment care cannot be overstated. Proper pre-treatment ensures that the natural lashes are optimally prepared for extension application, contributing to better adhesion and longevity. Post-treatment care is equally crucial, as it helps maintain the health of both the natural lashes and extensions, thereby extending their life. For tips on enhancing the duration your clients can enjoy their lashes, be sure to read our article on improving eyelash extension retention.

What should I look for when buying lash extension supplies?

Look for high-quality materials, a variety of lash lengths, thicknesses, and curls, as well as strong, safe adhesives. It's also important to check reviews and possibly get recommendations from fellow lash technicians.

Here at BELO Lash, we've carefully created a variety of lash extension types to suit all your needs. Our products are for lash techs, by lash techs, so you can be certain that all our lash trays are of the highest quality.

How can I ensure I'm buying safe and reliable lash extension supplies?

It's important to always purchase lash supplies from reputable vendors and check for any certifications or safety standards they adhere to. Also, look for products that are hypoallergenic and free from harmful chemicals.

Here at BELO Lash, for example, we manufacture to the highest quality to ensure your clients are delighted with their look every time.

How do I choose the right type of lashes when buying supplies?

When choosing between classic lashes, volume lashes, easy fans and pro-made fans, you'll need to consider your clientele's preferences as well as taking into account your own skill level. We recommend buying a range so you can offer a variety of types of lash looks, such as classic, volume, and hybrid lashes, in different lengths and curls to accommodate diverse styles.

If you're just starting out in your lash business and aren't super confident with your fan-making skills, we definitely recommend picking up some pro-made fans. This ensures you can deliver the super-glam hybrid and volume looks your clients crave!

Should I offer clients both black and brown lashes?

The choice is up to you; you know your clientele better than anyone! Brown lashes are very trendy right now, so it's a good idea to have some on hand just in case a client comes in wanting them.
